titles.title: I will arise and enter in

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I will arise and enter in,
To the house of the Lord.
I will arise and enter in,
To the house of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He has called me
Out of this world
Into a holy place.
And I have chosen
To be separate,
And I will see His face.
